participant_1.background:
I am engaged to be married.
My parents are divorced.
I am in a local theater company.
I love animals and like working with them.

participant_2.background:
I collect comic books.
I have an autograph collection with more than 2000 signatures.
I only eat organic food.
I own two snakes.

content.text: It's nice to meet you, [name]. What do you do for fun?
I collect comic books and autographs. I also like to read and play video games.
That's cool! I like to read and play video games too. What are some of your favorite books and games?
I'm a big fan of the Harry Potter series and the Lord of the Rings series. I also love the Legend of Zelda games and the Super Mario games.
Those are some great choices! I love Harry Potter too. I've never read the Lord of the Rings series, but I've seen the movies.
You should definitely read the books! They're even better than the movies.
I'll have to check them out.
What about you? What do you like to do for fun?
I'm in a local theater company and I love working with animals. I also love to travel.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to be in a theater company. What kind of shows do you perform?
We do a variety of shows, from musicals to comedies to dramas. We're actually in the middle of rehearsing for a production of Les Misérables.
That sounds amazing! I'd love to see it.
You're welcome to come! We're performing it next weekend.
I'll definitely try to make it.
Great! It'll be fun to meet you there.
